message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. My initial offer for the product is $12,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product but $12,000 is a bit high for my budget.  Would you consider a lower price?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. My counteroffer for the product is $10,500.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  I could go up to $9,500, but that's really pushing it for me.
I see your position, Bob. Considering the value of the product to you, my counteroffer would be $10,000.
Alice, we're getting closer. To be honest, I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers.  Would $9,750 work for you?
